Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Configure parameters that affect methodology summary results

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPPDoPPPoX_ThresholdTable (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, ConfiguredSessionCount, EnablePercentTolerance, PercentTolerance, ExpectedSessionRate FLOAT)
SELECT
AS ConfiguredSessionCount,
AS EnablePercentTolerance,
AS PercentTolerance,
AS ExpectedSessionRate

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 8905
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Configured DHCP-PD over PPPoE Session Count

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 3559
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Percent tolerance to apply to the configured DHCP-PD over PPPoE session connect rate to determine if the actual session setup rate is acceptable

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 835
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Expected session rate the test must at least converge on for the overall test to pass

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPPDoPPPoX_Port_Summary_Results (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, IterationMode TEXT, ExpectedSessions INTEGER, ConfigRequestRate REAL, TotalBoundCount INTEGER, TotalFailedCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedCount INTEGER, AttemptRate REAL, BindRate REAL, ConnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, FailedConnectCount INTEGER, RetriedConnectCount INTEGER, SuccSetupRate REAL, PercentTolerance REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPPDoPPPoX_System_Summary_Results (Iteration INTEGER, IterationMode TEXT, TotalExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotalConfigRequestRate REAL, TotalBoundCount INTEGER, TotalFailedCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedCount INTEGER, TotalAttemptRate REAL, TotalBindRate REAL, TotalConnectedCount INTEGER, TotalFailedConnectedCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedConnectCount INTEGER, TotalSuccSetupRate REAL, PercentTolerance REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPPDoPPPoX_Port_Iteration_Results (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, IterationMode TEXT, ExpectedSessions INTEGER, ConfigRequestRate REAL, TotalBoundCount INTEGER, TotalFailedCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedCount INTEGER, AttemptRate REAL, BindRate REAL, ConnectedSuccessCount INTEGER, FailedConnectCount INTEGER, RetriedConnectCount INTEGER, SuccSetupRate REAL, PercentTolerance REAL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xDHCPPDoPPPoX_System_Iteration_Results (Iteration INTEGER, IterationMode TEXT, TotalExpectedSessions INTEGER, TotalConfigRequestRate REAL, TotalBoundCount INTEGER, TotalFailedCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedCount INTEGER, TotalAttemptRate REAL, TotalBindRate REAL, TotalConnectedCount INTEGER, TotalFailedConnectedCount INTEGER, TotalRetriedConnectCount INTEGER, TotalSuccSetupRate REAL, PercentTolerance REAL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIteration_Traffic_Failures (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerDroppedCount INTEGER)

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration AS 'Iteration', Dres.PortName AS 'PortName', IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', cfg.DeviceCount AS 'ExpectedSessions', IterCfg.CurrVal AS 'ConfigRequestRate', Dres.TotalBoundCount AS 'TotalBoundCount', Dres.TotalFailedCount AS 'TotalFailedCount', Dres.TotalRetriedCount AS 'TotalRetriedCount', Dres.AttemptRate AS 'AttemptRate', Dres.BindRate AS 'BindRate', Pres.ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'ConnectedSuccessCount', Pres.FailedConnectCount AS 'FailedConnectCount', Pres.RetryCount AS 'RetriedConnectCount', Pres.SuccSetupRate AS 'SuccSetupRate', TR.PercentTolerance AS 'PercentTolerance' from (Select dev.Name, dev.DeviceCount, dhcp.Handle FROM Dhcpv6PdBlockConfig AS dhcp JOIN EmulatedDevice AS dev where dhcp.ParentHnd == dev.Handle) as cfg JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg JOIN Dhcpv6PortResults AS Dres JOIN PppoePortResults AS Pres JOIN xDHCPPDoPPPoX_ThresholdTable AS TR where Pres.PortName == Dres.PortName group by Pres.PortName

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration AS 'Iteration', IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode',(SELECT SUM(ED.DeviceCount) From EmulatedDevice AS ED JOIN Dhcpv6PdBlockConfig AS Dcfg where Dcfg.ParentHnd == ED.Handle) AS 'TotalExpectedSessions', SUM(Dres.TotalBoundCount) AS 'TotalBoundCount', SUM(Dres.TotalFailedCount) AS 'TotalFailedCount', SUM(Dres.TotalRetriedCount) AS 'TotalRetriedCount', SUM(IterCfg.CurrVal) AS 'TotalConfigRequestRate', SUM(Dres.AttemptRate) AS 'TotalAttemptRate', SUM(Dres.BindRate) AS 'TotalBindRate', SUM(Pres.ConnectedSuccessCount) AS 'TotalConnectedCount', SUM(Pres.FailedConnectCount) AS 'TotalFailedConnectedCount', SUM(Pres.RetryCount) AS 'TotalRetriedConnectCount', SUM(Pres.SuccSetupRate) AS 'TotalSuccSetupRate', TR.PercentTolerance AS 'PercentTolerance' from spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg JOIN Dhcpv6PortResults AS Dres JOIN PppoePortResults AS Pres JOIN xDHCPPDoPPPoX_ThresholdTable AS TR where Pres.PortName == Dres.PortName
SELECT * FROM xDHCPPDoPPPoX_Port_Iteration_Results
SELECT * FROM xDHCPPDoPPPoX_System_Iteration_Results
SELECT * FROM xDHCPPDoPPPoX_ThresholdTable

Children.Name: Test Methodology: Execute With Tags (Stop Client)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Test Methodology: Execute With Tags (Stop Client)

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 676
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Maximum amount of time in seconds to wait for DHCP-PD sessions to disconnect

report.display_name: Validate Iteration DHCP-PD over PPPoE Session Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All DHCP-PD over PPPoE sessions were bound/up with no errors detected.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Not all DHCP-PD over PPPoE sessions were bound/up and/or failures were detected.

sql_statement.static: SELECT PortName AS 'Port Name', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Session Count', TotalBoundCount AS 'DHCP-PD Total Bound Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Total Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Total Retried Count', ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'PPPoE Total Connected Count', FailedConnectCount AS 'PPPoE Total Failed Count', RetriedConnectCount AS 'PPPoE Total Retried Count' FROM xDHCPPDoPPPoX_Port_Iteration_Results WHERE (TotalBoundCount != ExpectedSessions OR ConnectedSuccessCount != ExpectedSessions)

report.display_name: Validate Iteration DHCP-PD over PPPoE Rate Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: DHCP-PD over PPPoE Setup Rate within configured threshold of Configured Rate.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: DHCP-PD over PPPoE Setup Rate not within configured threshold of Attempt Rate.

sql_statement.static: SELECT PortName AS 'Port Name', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Configured Request Rate (sessions/s)', BindRate AS 'Bind Rate (sessions/s)', SuccSetupRate AS 'Successful Setup Rate (sessions/s)' FROM xDHCPPDoPPPoX_Port_Iteration_Results  JOIN xDHCPPDoPPPoX_ThresholdTable AS Thr WHERE BindRate < (ConfigRequestRate * (1 - Thr.PercentTolerance * 0.01)) OR SuccSetupRate < ( 1- Thr.PercentTolerance * 0.01) * ConfigRequestRate

Children.Name: Results: Add Iteration Traffic Results to Temp Summary

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Add Iteration Traffic Results to Temp Summary

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIterationSigFrameResults (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerDroppedCount INTEGER)

SELECT (SELECT Iteration FROM spirent_methodology_benchmarkstabilityiteratorcommand) AS 'Iteration', p.Name AS 'PortName', p.Handle AS 'PortHandle', gen.GeneratorSigFrameCount, ana.SigFrameCount AS 'AnalyzerSigFrameCount', ana.DroppedFrameCount AS 'AnalyzerDroppedCount' FROM GeneratorPortResults AS gen JOIN AnalyzerPortResults AS ana JOIN Port AS p WHERE gen.ParentPort == p.Handle AND ana.ParentPort == p.Handle

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS xIteration_Traffic_Failures (Iteration INTEGER, PortName TEXT, PortHandle INTEGER, GeneratorSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerSigFrameCount INTEGER, AnalyzerDroppedCount INTEGER)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Tx/Rx frame counts were greater than 0 and no packet loss detected.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE name='val_Iteration_Traffic_Results')) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Detected 0 Tx and/or Rx frame counts or packet loss.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, PortName AS 'Port Name', GeneratorSigFrameCount AS 'Tx Frame Count', AnalyzerSigFrameCount AS 'Rx Frame Count', AnalyzerDroppedCount AS 'Dropped Frame Count' FROM xIterationSigFrameResults WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerDroppedCount > 0

SELECT Iteration, PortName, PortHandle, GeneratorSigFrameCount, AnalyzerSigFrameCount, AnalyzerDroppedCount FROM xIterationSigFrameResults WHERE GeneratorSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerSigFrameCount == 0 OR AnalyzerDroppedCount > 0

ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 1772
ExpProperties.EpDescription: Enable verify traffic in iteration when traffic is enabled

Children.Name: Results: Display DHCP and PPP detailed results

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Display DHCP and PPP detailed results

sql_statement.static: SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Conf.RequestRate AS 'Configured Request Rate (sessions/s)', Conf.ReleaseRate AS 'Configured Release Rate (sessions/s)', Res.TotalAttemptCount AS 'Attempted Count', Res.TotalBoundCount AS 'Bound Count', Res.TotalReboundCount AS 'Rebound Count', Res.TotalReleasedCount AS 'Released Count', Res.TotalDeclinedCount AS 'Declined Count', Res.TotalRenewedCount AS 'Renewed Count', Res.TotalFailedCount AS 'Failed Count', Res.TotalRetriedCount AS 'Retried Count', Res.AttemptRate AS 'Attempt Rate (sessions/s)', Res.BindRate AS 'Bind Rate (sessions/s)', Res.MinSetupTime AS 'Minimum Setup Time (ms)', Res.MaxSetupTime AS 'Maximum Setup Time (ms)', Res.AvgSetupTime AS 'Average Setup Time (ms)' FROM DHCPv6PortConfig AS Conf, DHCPv6PortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Conf.ConnectRate AS 'Configured Connect Rate (sessions/s)', Conf.DisconnectRate AS 'Configured Disconnect Rate (sessions/s)', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.AttemptedCount AS 'Attempted Count', Res.RetryCount AS 'Retry Count', Res.ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'Successful Connected Count', Res.FailedConnectCount AS 'Failed Connect Count', Res.DisconnectedSuccessCount AS 'Successful Disconnected Count', Res.FailedDisconnectCount AS 'Failed Disconnect Count', (CASE WHEN Conf.EmulationType=='SERVER' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.SuccSetupRate END) AS 'Successful Setup Rate (sessions/s)', (CASE WHEN Conf.EmulationType=='SERVER' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.MinSetupTime END) AS 'Minimum Setup Time (ms)', (CASE WHEN Conf.EmulationType=='SERVER' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.MaxSetupTime END) AS 'Maximum Setup Time (ms)', (CASE WHEN Conf.EmulationType=='SERVER' THEN 'N/A' ELSE Res.AvgSetupTime END) AS 'Average Setup Time (ms)' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.TxPadiCount AS 'Tx PADI Count', Res.RxPadoCount AS 'Rx PADO Count', Res.TxPadrCount AS 'Tx PADR Count', Res.RxPadsCount AS 'Rx PADS Count', Res.RxPadiCount AS 'Rx PADI Count', Res.TxPadoCount AS 'Tx PADO Count', Res.RxPadrCount AS 'Rx PADR Count', Res.TxPadsCount AS 'Tx PADS Count', Res.TxPadtCount AS 'Tx PADT Count', Res.RxPadtCount AS 'Rx PADT Count' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.TxLcpConfigRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Request Count', Res.RxLcpConfigRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Request Count', Res.TxLcpConfigRejectCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Reject Count', Res.RxLcpConfigRejectCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Reject Count', Res.TxLcpConfigAckCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Ack Count', Res.RxLcpConfigAckCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Ack Count', Res.TxLcpConfigNakCount AS 'Tx LCP Config Nak Count', Res.RxLcpConfigNakCount AS 'Rx LCP Config Nak Count', Res.TxLcpTermRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Terminate Request Count', Res.RxLcpTermRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Terminate Request Count', Res.TxLcpTermAckCount AS 'Tx LCP Terminate Ack Count', Res.RxLcpTermAckCount AS 'Rx LCP Terminate Ack Count', Res.TxLcpEchoRequestCount AS 'Tx LCP Echo Request Count', Res.RxLcpEchoRequestCount AS 'Rx LCP Echo Request Count', Res.TxLcpEchoReplyCount AS 'Tx LCP Echo Reply Count', Res.RxLcpEchoReplyCount AS 'Rx LCP Echo Reply Count' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

report.explanation: Authentication and NCP packet statistics per port.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Res.PortName AS 'Port Name', Res.Sessions AS 'Session Count', Res.TxIpv6cpCount AS 'Tx IPv6CP Count', Res.RxIpv6cpCount AS 'Rx IPv6CP Count', Res.TxPapCount AS 'Tx PAP Count', Res.RxPapCount AS 'Rx PAP Count', Res.TxChapCount AS 'Tx CHAP Count', Res.RxChapCount AS 'Rx CHAP Count' FROM PppoxPortConfig AS Conf, PppoePortResults AS Res, Port AS P WHERE P.Handle == Conf.ParentHnd AND Conf.Handle == Res.ParentHnd

Children.Name: Results: Run SQL (Delete temp iteration results table in summary db)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Run SQL (Delete temp iteration results table in summary db)

sql_statement.static: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS display_DHCPPDoPPPoX_Iteration_Block_Results
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS val_Iteration_DHCPPDoPPPoX_Session_Results
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS val_Iteration_DHCPPDoPPPoX_Rate_Results
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS val_Iteration_Traffic_Results

Properties.Name: Description
Properties.Value: Parameters for summary results validation configuration

sql_statement.static: SELECT ED.DeviceCount AS SessionCount, DC.OutstandingSessionCount AS OutstandingSessionCount, EnableStabilityBackoff, MinVal AS SearchMinVal, MaxVal AS SearchMaxVal, RepeatCount AS StabilityRepeatCount, StepVal AS StabilityBackoffStep, SuccessPercent AS StabilitySuccessPercent, IsConverged, ConvergedVal, FoundStableValue, StableValue FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter JOIN EmulatedDevice AS ED JOIN Dhcpv6PortConfig AS DC JOIN DHCPv6PdBlockConfig AS DBC JOIN RelationTable AS RT WHERE (SELECT Iter.Handle FROM Tag AS Tag, RelationTable AS RT, spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter) and RT.SourceHnd == ED.Handle and RT.TargetHnd == DC.ParentHnd and DBC.ParentHnd == ED.Handle group by Iter.Iteration

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM Dhcp_Summary_IteratorProfile)) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Error retrieving DHCP-PD over PPPoE Benchmarking configurations.

sql_statement.static: SELECT SessionCount AS 'Session Count', OutstandingSessionCount AS 'Outstanding Session Count', SearchMinVal AS 'Search Minimum Session Rate (sessions/s)', SearchMaxVal AS 'Search Maximum Session Rate (sessions/s)', (CASE WHEN EnableStabilityBackoff = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END) AS 'Enable Stability Backoff', StabilityRepeatCount AS 'Stability Repeat Count', StabilityBackoffStep AS 'Stability Backoff Step', StabilitySuccessPercent AS 'Stability Backoff Success (%)' FROM Dhcp_IteratorEndState
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DHCPoPPPConfig ('Parameter' VARCHAR(64), 'Value' VARCHAR(64))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Enable Auto Retry', (select case when EnableAutoRetry=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Auto Retry Count', (select AutoRetryCount from PppoeClientBlockConfig) where exists (select * from PppoeClientBlockConfig where EnableAutoRetry=1)
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Type of Authentication', (select Authentication from PppoeClientBlockConfig ))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Username', (select Username from PppoeClientBlockConfig) where exists (select * from PppoeClientBlockConfig where Authentication != 'NONE')
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Password', (select Password from PppoeClientBlockConfig) where exists (select * from PppoeClientBlockConfig where Authentication != 'NONE')
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('Enable Echo Requests', (select case when EnableEchoRequest=1 then 'TRUE' else 'FALSE' end from PppoeClientBlockConfig))

insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Interval Between Sending Out Consecutive Echo Requests (s)', (select EchoRequestGenFreq from PppoeClientBlockConfig) where exists (select * from PppoeClientBlockConfig where EnableEchoRequest=1)

insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) select 'Maximum Echo Request Attempt', (select MaxEchoRequestAttempts from PppoeClientBlockConfig) where exists (select * from PppoeClientBlockConfig where EnableEchoRequest=1)
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PADI Timeout (s)', (select PadiTimeout from PppoeClientBlockConfig ))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PADI Max Attempts', (select PadiMaxAttempts from PppoeClientBlockConfig ))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PADR Timeout (s)', (select PadrTimeout from PppoeClientBlockConfig ))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('PADR Max Attempts', (select PadrMaxAttempts from PppoeClientBlockConfig ))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('LCP Config Request Timeout (s)', (select LcpConfigRequestTimeout from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('LCP Config Request Max Attempts', (select LcpConfigRequestMaxAttempts from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('NCP Config Request Timeout (s)', (select NcpConfigRequestTimeout from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
insert into DHCPoPPPConfig(Parameter, Value) values('NCP Config Request Max Attempts', (select NcpConfigRequestMaxAttempts from PppoeClientBlockConfig))
select Parameter as 'Parameter', Value as 'Configured Value'  from DHCPoPPPConfig
SELECT EnableStabilityBackoff, IsConverged, ConvergedVal, FoundStableValue, StableValue FROM Dhcp_IteratorEndState

Children.Name: Results: Verify DHCPPD Port Summary Results

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Results: Verify DHCPPD Port Summary Results

report.display_name: DHCP-PD over PPPoE System Summary Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: DHCP-PD over PPPoE System Summary Results
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Error retrieving DHCP-PD over PPPoE System Summary Results.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM display_DHCPPDoPPPoX_System_Summary_Results)) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN TotalBindRate < (TotalConfigRequestRate * (1 - PercentTolerance * 0.01)) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN TotalConnectedCount != TotalExpectedSessions THEN 'FAIL' WHEN TotalBoundCount != TotalExpectedSessions THEN 'FAIL' WHEN TotalSuccSetupRate < ( 1- PercentTolerance * 0.01) * TotalConfigRequestRate THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Test Phase', TotalExpectedSessions AS 'Total Expected Session Count', TotalBoundCount AS 'Total DHCP-PD Bound Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'Total DHCP-PD Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'Total DHCP-PD Retried Count', TotalConnectedCount AS 'Total PPPoE Connected Count', TotalFailedConnectedCount AS 'Total PPPoE Failed Count', TotalRetriedConnectCount AS 'Total PPPoE Retried Count', TotalConfigRequestRate AS 'Total Configured Setup Rate (sessions/s)', TotalBindRate AS 'Total DHCP-PD Bind Rate (sessions/s)', TotalSuccSetupRate AS 'Total PPPoE Successful Setup Rate (sessions/s)', PercentTolerance AS 'Setup Rate Tolerance (%)' FROM xDHCPPDoPPPoX_System_Summary_Results

report.display_name: DHCP-PD over PPPoE Port Summary Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: DHCP-PD over PPPoE Port Summary Results

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM display_DHCPPDoPPPoX_Iteration_Block_Results)) == 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Error retrieving DHCP-PD over PPPoE Port Summary Results.

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN BindRate < (ConfigRequestRate * (1 - PSR.PercentTolerance * 0.01)) THEN 'FAIL' WHEN ExpectedSessions != TotalBoundCount THEN 'FAIL' WHEN ExpectedSessions != ConnectedSuccessCount THEN 'FAIL' WHEN (SuccSetupRate < ( 1- PSR.PercentTolerance * 0.01) * ConfigRequestRate) THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Iteration State', PortName AS 'Port Name', ExpectedSessions AS 'Expected Session Count',  TotalBoundCount AS 'DHCP-PD Bound Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'DHCP-PD Retried Count', ConnectedSuccessCount AS 'PPPoE Connected Count', FailedConnectCount AS 'PPPoE Failed Count', RetriedConnectCount AS 'PPPoE Retried Count', ConfigRequestRate AS 'Configured Setup Rate (sessions/s)', BindRate AS 'DHCP-PD Bind Rate (sessions/s)', SuccSetupRate AS 'PPPoE Successful Setup Rate ( sessions/s)', PSR.PercentTolerance AS 'Setup Rate Tolerance (%)' FROM xDHCPPDoPPPoX_Port_Summary_Results AS PSR
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DhcpScaleSessionRate (ConvergedSessionRate FLOAT, StableValue FLOAT)

SELECT CASE IsConverged WHEN 0 THEN 'Did not converge' ELSE ConvergedVal END AS 'ConvergedSessionRate', CASE FoundStableValue WHEN 0 THEN CASE EnableStabilityBackOff WHEN 0 THEN 'N/A' ELSE 'No stable rate found' END ELSE StableValue END AS 'StableValue' FROM Dhcp_ScaleResult

report.explanation: Verifies that converged session rate is larger than the expected session rate.

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Converged and stable session rate meets the expected session rate.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Converged or stable session rate is less than the expected session rate.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT case when (EnableStabilityBackoff=1 AND FoundStableValue = 0) OR (IsConverged=0) OR (IsConverged=1 AND cast(ConvergedVal as float)<(select ExpectedSessionRate from xDHCPPDoPPPoX_ThresholdTable)) OR (FoundStableValue=1 AND cast(StableValue as float)<(select ExpectedSessionRate from xDHCPPDoPPPoX_ThresholdTable)) then 0 else 1 end from Dhcp_ScaleResult

report.display_name: DHCP-PD over PPPoE Session Rate Results

sql_statement.static: select ConvergedSessionRate as 'Converged Session Rate (sessions/s)', StableValue AS 'Stable Rate (sessions/s)', ExpectedSessionRate as 'Expected Session Rate (sessions/s)' from DhcpScaleSessionRate join xDHCPPDoPPPoX_ThresholdTable group by ExpectedSessionRate

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Tx/Rx frame counts were greater than 0 and no packet loss detected.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Detected 0 Tx and/or Rx frame counts or packet loss.

sql_statement.static: SELECT * FROM xIteration_Traffic_Failures
